name: El usuario elimina una materia correctamente
scenarioId: delete_subject:El usuario elimina una materia correctamente
methodName: El usuario elimina una materia correctamente

testSteps.description: Given que el usuario esta autenticado en la plataforma Toolbox

children.description: usuario executes a POST on the resource auth/login

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: POST, GET, OPTIONS, DELETE
Access-Control-Max-Age: 3600
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Accept, X-Requested-With, remember-me, Authorization
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 0
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Sat, 09 Nov 2024 01:13:24 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

testSteps.description: When el usuario la solicitud para eliminar la materias con id "testid"

children.description: usuario executes a DELETE on the resource subjectfull/testid

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: POST, GET, OPTIONS, DELETE
Access-Control-Max-Age: 3600
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Accept, X-Requested-With, remember-me, Authorization
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 0
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
X-Frame-Options: DENY
Date: Sat, 09 Nov 2024 01:13:24 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

testSteps.description: Then el sistema deberia confirmar la eliminacion con un estado HTTP 204

userStory.narrative:
Como usuario administrador del portal, quiero registrar una nueva materia
  proporcionando los detalles de la materia para que este disponible en el sistema.

title: El usuario elimina una materia correctamente
